name: Driftin' Shippin'
description:
Make insane deliveries while driving in a desert city, everyone's at home and you should deliever their necessities.

This game was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 88 Themed "Rush"

W => Accelerate

A D => Turn Left/Right

S => Brake/Reverse

P/Esc => Pause/Unpause

Please leave me your feedback about the game, what did you liked and what i can improve.

I hope you have Fun

LT Games.
